game.name: Iron Decree
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, LAN 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Wield swords and spells to survive endless waves of undead. Perform rituals, unlock powerful gear, and fight alongside friends to defend a cursed fortress.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Wield swords and spells to survive endless waves of undead. Perform rituals, unlock powerful gear, and fight alongside friends to defend a cursed fortress.
